_header: Now righteous judge Christ Lord Jesu
Title(s): ‘Iuste iudex Ihesu Christe rex regum & Domine’
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ; translations
_description: A translation of the Latin verses, ‘Iuste iudex Ihesu Christe rex regum & Domine’, etc. — twelve 6-line stanzas

OxfCCC274.First Lines:
Now rightwis Iuge crist lord Ihesuof kyngis
                    kyng…

Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.
